name: Curved Lounge Chair - Merlot
description: Meet the Curved Lounge Chair - Merlot a celebration of warmth, comfort, and design. An armchair created to relax with a glass of wine and your favourite book. Designed to be both comfy and minimalist, our creators have added delicacy through the subtle lines and gentle curving. The Curved Lounge Chair is crafted for comfort and durability. Featuring a wooden frame, softened with the highest quality foam padding, finished with soft merlot velvet.
